## Why Watch Anime Like a Normie?
Ever tried watching anime from the terminal? ğŸ–¥ï¸âœ¨ Yeah, me neither. But one day, while staring into the abyss of CLI tools and minimalism-induced existential dread, we thought: Why not? ğŸ¤·â€â™‚ï¸

Kaizen is here to fulfill that dream (or nightmare, depending on how much you love the terminal). A native, no-nonsense, super-aesthetic TUI for streaming your favorite animeâ€”right from your beloved command line. ğŸ¥ğŸŒ

No more context-switching, no more bloated browser tabs screaming at your CPU like it owes them money. With Kaizen, itâ€™s just you, your terminal, and an uninterrupted anime binge-fest.

So, grab your instant ramen ğŸœ, fire up Kaizen, and letâ€™s go full weeb mode. ğŸŒ¸âœ¨ Terminal supremacy, but make it anime. ğŸ‰
